clumpy.resampling.under_sampling.compute_sampling_strategy¶

clumpy.resampling.under_sampling.compute_sampling_strategy(y, gamma=1, beta=None, u=None, return_beta=False)[source]¶

Compute sampling strategy

Parameters

  • y (TYPE) – DESCRIPTION.

  • gamma (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is 1.

  • beta (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is None.

  • u (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is None.

  • return_beta (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is False.

Returns

Return type

None.
